system.availability: Silvered Vambrace provided to Deathwatch Keepers, strange Archeotech device that bypasses nearly all Imperial Locks, Seals, or Automated Defence Systems. If a roll is required, such as a Security Test, the wearer counts as Having the Security Skill if they do not, and adds +30 to all Security Tests to bypass or open such locks/seals/etc. Medicae Tests on wearer also have +10.
